Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Paint and Carpet in the Offices

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Immediate access to Interstate 94, excellent access to labor, local amenities minutes away, and low lake county taxes.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 20,766 SF available for lease in North Lake County. Common.SubdivisionName.Common.Text: 16,937 SF For Lease in Bridge Point North

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: The building has 16,937 SF currently available for lease and features 32' clear height, 4 exterior docks, 1 drive-in door, office space to suit, and 22 car parking spaces.

Common.UnitBrochures.Common.BrochureName: Waukegan, BPN VIII_3959 Burwood Drive - 16,937 SF Available for Lease.pdf

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Bridge Point North is Lake County’s newest Premier Business Park Development. Consisting of 225 acres and located in Waukegan, Illinois, Bridge Point North offers the unique opportunity for industrial or warehousing companies considering Lake County Illinois. Phase I (1,025,000 SF) was completed in 2017. Phase II (926,947 SF) was completed in 2019. Phase III consists of 4 buildings (918,972 SF) that will be delivered between Q2 and Q4 of 2020. Immediate access to Interstate 94, excellent access to labor, and low lake county taxes make Bridge Point North the premier Lake County Business location for corporate headquarters facilities, hi-tech manufacturing firms, distribution/warehouse operations and life science facilities.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: BPN VIII is part of Bridge Point North Phase III and is a 100,314 SF Class A industrial facility. The building has 16,937 SF currently available for lease and features 32' clear height, 4 exterior docks, 1 drive-in door, office space to suit, and 22 car parking spaces.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 16,937 SF For Lease in Bridge Point North, Waukegan

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Corporate neighbors include Amazon, Abbott Labs, Cardinal Health, Uline, Medline, and The Visual Pak Companies
Executive conference rooms, dinette, shower, additional meeting rooms, large on-site kitchen/cafeteria, large tenant lounge/breakroom area
Loading: Seven (7) exterior docks; one (1) drive-in door

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located directly on Route 43/Waukegan Road and minutes from I-94.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 1931 N. Norman is located in Norman Woods Off/Ind Park and features a state-of-the-art warehouse and 35,320 SF of upscale office space. The warehouse has 34' clear height, 7 exterior docks, 1 drive-in door, ESFR sprinklers, and a 4,126 SF mezzanine. The office space includes two large executive office suites, conference rooms, large on-site kitchen and cafeteria, three break rooms, and an outdoor grill and numerous break areas.
